problem.p: Rank the following greenhouse gases from greatest to lowest global warming potential (GWP). Drag and drop from the list below.

customresponse.answer: correct_answer = [{'draggables': ['1'], 'targets': ['t4'], 'rule':'exact'}, {'draggables': ['2'], 'targets': ['t1'], 'rule':'exact'}, {'draggables': ['3'], 'targets': ['t2'], 'rule':'exact'}, {'draggables': ['4'], 'targets': ['t3'], 'rule':'exact'}, {'draggables': ['5'], 'targets': ['t5'], 'rule':'exact'}] if draganddrop.grade(submission[0], correct_answer): correct = ['correct'] else: correct = ['incorrect']
